driver_type: REMOVABALE FOR DEFAULT VALUE | EITHER "firefox" (DEFAULT) OR "chrome"
telegram_status_message_id: OPTIONALLY INSERT VALUE HERE TO MAINTAIN STATUS MESSAGE

visa: REMOVABALE FOR DEFAULT VALUE | INSERT MENU ENTRY TO CHOOSE HERE OR REMOVE THE PARAM TO APPLY DEFAULT

user_agent: REMOVABALE FOR DEFAULT VALUE | INSERT CUSTOM ONE OR REMOVE PARAM TO APPLY DEFAULT
